entry.title: New release for BudgetBee: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Welcome to version v0.7.0

In this version a new element called "Budgets" has been introduced. This is a new tab to create monthly budgets for each category. At the moment it is something simple, but it serves as an idea so that in the future new functionalities can be added to it.

What's Changed

entry.title: New release for BudgetBee: v.0.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

A model has been added that learns from your records and predicts what your category and subcategory will be for the next records.

Now when importing json or xlsx files, if the category is not passed or is empty, the model will try to predict these, and if not, it will put it in the 'Unknown' category.

  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.4 to 1.15.6 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/93
  • Bump vite from 5.0.10 to 5.0.12 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/budgetbee/budgetbee/pull/85

entry.title: New release for BudgetBee: v0.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Rules have been added (currently they can only be configured in desktop version) to be able to set categories based on the concept automatically.

The rules will act like the AI prediction model, first it is checked if any of the configured rules apply and if not, then the model defines the category.

At the moment the rules are very basic, in next versions the scope of the rules will be extended.
